description: This file defines a theming class for a Flutter application, providing light and dark mode themes with specific color schemes, styles, and widget themes under the class 'AppTheme'.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that encapsulates theme data for the app, including color schemes and widget styling for both light and dark modes.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: A static getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean Professional light theme.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalDarkTheme
methods.description: A static getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean Professional dark theme.
